name: Red Roses Bouquet
description: A beautiful bouquet of fresh red roses, symbolizing love and passion. Perfect for romantic occasions like anniversaries, proposals, or Valentine's Day.

name: White Lilies
description: Elegant white lilies that add a touch of grace and sophistication. Ideal for weddings, sympathy occasions, or as a sign of purity.

name: Yellow Tulips
description: Vibrant yellow tulips that convey happiness and positivity. A perfect gift to brighten someone's day or celebrate friendships.

name: Orchid Arrangement
description: An exotic arrangement of purple and white orchids, known for their luxury and charm. Perfect for special occasions or as a decorative piece.

name: Mixed Flower Basket
description: A delightful basket of mixed flowers including roses, daisies, and carnations. Suitable for any celebration or as a thoughtful gift.

name: Sunflower Bunch
description: A radiant bunch of sunflowers that symbolize adoration and loyalty. Ideal for birthdays or to brighten someone's mood.

name: Peace Lily Plant
description: A potted peace lily plant, known for its air-purifying qualities and easy maintenance. Perfect for home or office spaces.

name: Carnation Bouquet
description: A vibrant bouquet of carnations available in various colors, representing admiration and good luck. Ideal for celebrations or expressions of gratitude.

name: Rose and Chocolate Combo
description: A delightful combination of fresh red roses and premium chocolates. A perfect gift to express love and appreciation.

name: Tulips and Teddy Combo
description: A charming gift set featuring vibrant tulips and a soft teddy bear. Ideal for birthdays, anniversaries, or special surprises.

name: Premium Valentine's Roses
description: Exquisite long-stemmed red roses specially curated for Valentine's Day. Perfect for making a romantic statement.

name: Wedding Floral Arch
description: A stunning floral arch designed for weddings, featuring a mix of roses, lilies, and greenery. Adds a touch of elegance to your special day.

name: Diwali Floral Rangoli
description: A vibrant floral rangoli arrangement with marigolds and roses, perfect for Diwali or festive celebrations.

name: Christmas Wreath
description: A traditional Christmas wreath made with fresh evergreens, pinecones, and red ribbons. Ideal for holiday decor.

name: Birthday Flower and Balloon Combo
description: A lively gift set including a colorful flower arrangement and helium balloons. Perfect for birthday celebrations.

name: Exotic Bonsai Plant
description: A meticulously nurtured bonsai plant, symbolizing balance and harmony. A perfect addition to any home or office.

name: Indoor Succulent Set
description: A set of three low-maintenance succulent plants, ideal for indoor spaces. Great for gifts or personal decor.

name: Lavender Bunch
description: A fragrant bunch of fresh lavender flowers, known for their calming and relaxing properties. Perfect for homes or as gifts.

name: Orchid and Candle Combo
description: A luxurious gift set featuring an orchid arrangement and scented candles. Ideal for anniversaries or romantic evenings.

name: Romantic Rose Basket
description: A heart-shaped basket filled with red and pink roses. Designed for expressing love and affection.

name: Seasonal Wildflowers
description: A mix of freshly picked seasonal wildflowers, offering a rustic and natural charm. Ideal for casual gifting.

name: Corporate Desk Plant
description: A small potted plant, perfect for corporate desks and workspaces. Adds a touch of greenery to your environment.

name: Festive Marigold Garland
description: Traditional marigold garlands, ideal for festive occasions, weddings, or religious ceremonies.

name: Elegant Calla Lilies
description: Sophisticated calla lilies in white or pink, symbolizing elegance and purity. Perfect for weddings or formal events.

name: Hydrangea Bouquet
description: A stunning bouquet of hydrangeas in pastel shades, known for their lush appearance. Perfect for decor or gifting.

name: Gerbera Daisies
description: Bright and cheerful gerbera daisies available in multiple colors. Ideal for spreading joy and positivity.

name: Romantic Candlelight Set
description: A romantic set featuring roses, candles, and chocolates, curated for memorable evenings.

name: Seasonal Floral Arrangement
description: A seasonal arrangement of fresh flowers, customized for events or gifting.

name: Luxury Orchid Basket
description: A luxurious basket featuring a mix of exotic orchids and decorative elements. Ideal for high-end gifts.

name: Traditional Flower Strings
description: Traditional flower strings made of jasmine or marigold, used for ceremonies or home decoration.

name: Wedding Table Centerpiece
description: A sophisticated floral centerpiece for wedding tables, featuring roses, lilies, and orchids.

name: Blossoming Gift Hamper
description: A gift hamper featuring flowers, chocolates, and a personalized card. Perfect for celebrations or thank-you gifts.

name: Garden Rose Arrangement
description: A charming arrangement of garden roses in various shades. Ideal for home decor or as a thoughtful gift.

name: Floral Subscription Box
description: A monthly subscription delivering fresh flowers to your doorstep. A perfect way to enjoy seasonal blooms.

name: Event Floral Backdrop
description: A customized floral backdrop for events, featuring a mix of roses, hydrangeas, and decorative greens.
